title: How do I type so my teammates can see what I am type?
body: I am trying to type and ask questions to my teammates, but I assume they are unable to see me typing. How can I ask questions and communicate with my teammates?

replies.body: If you're being 100% serious then you need to watch some videos, play some tutorials and try out massive amounts of bot and custom games.
Pressing Shift Enter does not affect my ability to type as far as I can tell.
My team mates do not see what I type and do not answer the questions I am asking. I am unable to play the game to the leve they are askign me, when I cannot ask questions.
You press enter and the chat bar opens, type what you want then press enter again. Shift+enter to speak to ALL including the enemy

What..?

Not sure if bad troll post or just bad.
low key venting about shit teammates: the thread
